2a1('bum): shes rang kyang rol tu phyir pa dben pa'o// tshorab
2a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
2a3('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'du bang dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rel
2b1('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'i// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
2b2('bum): dben pa'o// mi ga dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// nga dben pa'i phyir she
2b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu pa na po dngan pa'o// sna dben pa'i phyir shes ra da kyi pha rol tu pani
2b4('bum): pa dben pa'o// lho dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rang la// lus dben pa'i phyir/ 
2b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pong dben pa'o// yid ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa/ 
3a1('bum): gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sgra
3a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dri dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3a3('bum): pa dben pa'o// ro dpe na pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// reg dben
3a4('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// cho sa dben pa'i phyir shes rab
3a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
3a6('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
3b1('bum): dben pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
3b2('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3b3('bum): pa dben pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben
3b4('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3b5('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir
3b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lus 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
3b7('bum): pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
4a1('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
4a2('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab
4a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las zung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 
4a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus
4a5('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ 
4a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mo'i khams dben
4a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 
4b1('bum): mkha' khams dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa
4b2('bum): ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes
4b3('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// skye mched
4b4('bum): drug dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// reg dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshor ba
4b5('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpe na pa'o// sred pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// len pa dben pa'i
4b6('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
4b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ sarga shi dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 
4b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
5a1('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
5a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
5a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5a4('bum): pa dben pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
5a5('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab tu
5a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
5a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes
5a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ 
5b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i
5b2('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dngos pa'i med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
5b3('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yang dag par spong ba
5b4('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben ba'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dbang po dben pa'i phyir
5b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// stobs dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
5b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes
5b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 
5b8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mthar
6a1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa
6a2('bum): smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ting 'dzin dben pa'i phyir
6a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
6a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyi ra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
6a5('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
6a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
6a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
6a8('bum): dben pa'o// rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam pa
6b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lha'i bu dag gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dben par
6b2('bum): bshad pa la sems mi 'dzum pa yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/ ro'i yid 'jigs par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
6b3('bum): spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
6b4('bum): tu phyin pa zhum par mi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
6b5('bum): pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma skyes pa'i slad du/ bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
6b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na
6b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ dmigasu ma mchis// 
6b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshad pa la mi 'dzum/ mi 'gong zhing / yid chad pa dang / sgying lugs par mi 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs mi sdang
7a1('bum): skrag par mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ 
7a2('bum): gis zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dab
7a3('bum): po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
7a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ dbang po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bya bar ma zad do/ 
7a5('bum): gang 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ba'i ris kyi lnga rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
7a6('bum): de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la phyag bya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
7a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med/ tshad med pa gang ji snyed cig cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
7a8('bum): de la dgongs pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshul khrims
7b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// sa
7b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid
7b3('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
7b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
7b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed
7b6('bum): pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mi dmigs
7b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
7b8('bum): yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba bani yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par
8a1('bum): byed pa'o// dbang po lnga yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// stobs lnga yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
8a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshad
8a3('bum): med pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// mthar
8a4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ 
8a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// ting 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzu ngas kyi sgo rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin
8a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// snying rje
8a7('bum): chen po yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// lan cig/ 
8a8('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang byang chub yongasasu
8b1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// zhes dgongs pa mdzad do// rab 'byor
8b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
8b3('bum): chen po da ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba bzhugs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams dag na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdud
8b4('bum): sdig to can du gyur te/ bdud sdig to can re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud sdig to can mngon par sprul kyang / de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar
8b5('bum): chad bya bar mi nuso// rab 'byor chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig toHna rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ chos
8b6('bum): thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par bltas pa yin/ des sems can thams cad kyang yongs su ma btang ba yin te/ rab 'byor chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
8b7('bum): dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang
8b8('bum): ldan pa'i bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin to// gnyis gang zhe na/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab
9a1('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni bdud sdig po can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no// 
9a2('bum): rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du ni lha'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems so// bsnyen bkur ba dang yongasu 'dra ba dang / kun 'dri ba yang byed par
9a3('bum): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur gyis/ de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang / mtshan ma med pas
9a4('bum): rnam par spyod pa dang / smon pa med pas rnam par spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyod par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe/ na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des/ rnam par
9a5('bum): spyod pa dang sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi 'gon du gyur ro// sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyuraro// sems can dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung
9a6('bum): gnyen du 'gyur ro// sems can gnas med pa rnams kyi gnasu 'gyuraro// sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro// sems can gling med pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro// sems
9a7('bum): can mun par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes de la spro ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med/ grangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas
9a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
9b1('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming dang rigs yongs
9b2('bum): brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ngad lngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi ming
9b3('bum): yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug pud kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
9b4('bum): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i zha 'bring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ shes
9b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ma bral ba de dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du ba rjod pa ched du brjod pa bzhin no// shar phyogs kyi sangs
9b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji skad cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod
9b7('bum): cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
9b8('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab
10a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
10a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes
10a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
10a4('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ste da cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
10a5('bum): phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis cha sa ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10a6('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pi spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha
10a7('bum): tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
10a8('bum): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
10b1('bum): dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
10b2('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
10b3('bum): dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
10b4('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
10b5('bum): phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
10b6('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol
10b7('bum): tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig
10b8('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
11a1('bum): pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
11a2('bum): po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la 'ang / sangs rgyas bcom
11a3('bum): ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11a4('bum): po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don tu zhugs pa de dag ni dga' ba byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa'
11a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po sngar ldog pa 'am/ slar mi ldog pa 'am/ gang gi ming yongasu brjod pa'i tshul gyis ston pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
11a6('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ma bstan
11a7('bum): pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod de/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod
11a8('bum): pa mdzad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
11b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjesu slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag s+ho/ 
11b2('bum): bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi rjesu slob pa'i tshul gyis byang
11b3('bum): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor gzhan
11b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa chos thams/ 
11b5('bum): cang stong ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog gsob ste/ rag lus so zhes bya ba dang / snying po med pa'o// zhes bya bar
11b6('bum): mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// 
11b7('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad
11b8('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis spangs pa yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang lung bstan pa
12a1('bum): yin rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongasu brjod pa
12a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa 'di la gnas par 'gyur te/ de la gnas pas rnam
12a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos na/ 'di ni de bzhin
12a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur med cing the tsom mi za ba la rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ des ni phyis kyang
12a5('bum): rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos par
12a6('bum): gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji
12a7('bum): sang du bstan de bzhin du mos pas phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par gyur te/ rab 'byor de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ni phan
12a8('bum): pa mang por 'gyur ba yin te/ gang gis mos shing mos nas/ de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni smos kyang mi smos te/ de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas/ 
12b1('bum): bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid du gnas nas/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyi ste/ 
12b2('bum): chos gang la yang ma dmigs na/ de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos kyang gang yang
12b3('bum): mi dmigs na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
12b4('bum): 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis na// de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la
12b5('bum): gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ 
12b6('bum): de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa
12b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par
12b8('bum): gzhan dmig su med de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigasu med na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
13a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas meng do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// 
13a2('bum): bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
13a3('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par gzhan dmigasu med de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigasu
13a4('bum): med na/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 
13a5('bum): bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smo/ sa te/ de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de
13a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o// chos
13a7('bum): rnams kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de
13a8('bum): de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba su yang med na/ de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de
13b1('bum): ni gnas med do// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom
13b2('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dka' bar bgyid pa'o// 
13b3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang dmig su ma mchis te/ su 'ang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa
13b4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang gang yang ma mchis te/ chos ston pa yang gang yang ma mchis la/ des zhum par yang mi 'gyur zhing de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs
13b5('bum): par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lnga'i dbang po brgya bya na la 'di skad ces smraso// kai'u shi ka gang khyod kyis 'di
13b6('bum): skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur mi 'gyur/ rmongs par mi 'gyur ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsol pa ni
13b7('bum): ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa yin na/ de la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba lnga su zhig yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang ci sngon
13b8('bum): kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston te ci la yang chags pa med do// 'di lnga ste dper na/ bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ji la yang chags pa med do// de bzhin du gan
14a1('bum): na pa 'arjod gyis chos bstan pa yang tshal yang rgyags pa ma // sa bkyi rom tsun parjod drag pa lus / 
14a2('bum): de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bdag gis de skad du gsol te/ de skad du brjod nas/ 
14a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjesu brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung bstan pas/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcor ldan
14a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/  she ga khyod kyis de gad du smras pa/ de skang du brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjesu brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing
14a5('bum): chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung ston par 'gyur// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'dis ci dang ci spobs pa de thams cad
14a6('bum): pa zhing brtsams shing spobs/ mtshan sa mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spog
14a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs
14a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyi stong pa nyid
14b1('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing spongs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
14b2('bum): brtsams shing spongs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs
14b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
14b4('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsa mas shing spobs/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing
14b5('bum): spobs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spob sa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ 
14b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ dang yo du mas tsha byes ste ba rnams 'cha bang thams/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtsams shing
14b7('bum): spongs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spongs/ bsam gtan rnams brtsams shing spobs/ tshad med pa
14b8('bum): rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thar pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
15a1('bum): / 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa brtsams shing spobs/ mngon par
15a2('bum): shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams shing spobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams
15a3('bum): shing spobs/ mi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spongs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ snying rje chen po brtsams shing spobs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
15a4('bum): pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bra sa du brtsams shing spobs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsa
15a5('bum): shing spobs/ dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs/ lam gyi rnam pa sha sa pa nyid brtsams shing spongs/ rnam pa thams cad
15a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha
15a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang tshul khrims kyi pha
15a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
15b1('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
15b2('bum): la spyod pa lta ci smos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang
15b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi nang stong pa
15b4('bum): 'di la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyidi la bsgo ma pa lta ci smos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 
15b5('bum): gang chen po stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ don dang pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang don dam pa ste/ nga pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus byas stong pa
15b6('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa'inyi da kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 
15b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang
15b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lnga ci smos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lnga ci smos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
16a1('bum): kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang chos thams cad stong pa nyidadi la sgom
16a2('bum): pa lta ci smos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ma
16a3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyidadi la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lnga ci smos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
16a4('bum): na gang ngo bo nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos
16a5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sgom pa lnga ci smos yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang yang
16a6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sgom pa lnga ci smos/ dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs
16a7('bum): na gang dbang po rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang stobs rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang
16a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sgom pa lta ci spos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang mi dmigs na/ gang 'a phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sgom pa lnga ci smos/ 
16b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam gtan rnams la
16b2('bum): sgom pa lta ci smos/ tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang tshad med pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ 
16b3('bum): gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mthar
16b4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
16b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mngon
16b6('bum): par shes pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mngon par shes pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ ti nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang tingange 'dzin rnams la sgom pa lnga ci smos/ 
16b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
16b8('bum): stobs rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa lnga ci smos/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ so so yang dag par rig
17a1('bum): pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lnga ci spos/ snying rje chen po 'ad kyang mi dmigs na/ !
17a2('bum): snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub
17a3('bum): pa lta ci smos/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rje su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang
17a4('bum): mi dmigs na/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyir mi 'ong
17a5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lnga ci smos/ dgra ba com pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu rjesu 'thob pa lnga ci smos/ 
17a6('bum): byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu rje su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'ing
17a7('bum): rjesu 'thob pa lta ci smos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rje su 'thob pa lnga ci smos/ de bzhin nyid kyang mi dmigs na
17a8('bum): gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa lta ci smos/ mtshan rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la
17b1('bum): mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lnga ci smos/ dngape byang bzang po rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan pa
17b2('bum): 'byor ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ dmigs su med pa la rnam par spyod pastong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan
17b3('bum): ma med pa rnam par spyod pa/ smon pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang
17b5('bum): bar mi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro 'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang 1
17b6('bum): du mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// 
17b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / 
17b8('bum): nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
18a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o// rab ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na ma
18a2('bum): pa gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar
18a3('bum): 'dod pas/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang
18a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
18a5('bum): yongasu skong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so ngas su rdzogs par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rje su 'thob par 'gyuraro// rnam pa
18a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rje su thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
18a7('bum): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam pa nyis rtsa
18a8('bum): de nas 'khor de'i nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams man da ra ba mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// dge slong brgya drug cu tsam ya
18b1('bum): stan las langs nas/ chos gos phrag pa gcig la bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang la de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas/ bcom
18b2('bum): ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing phyag 'tshalo// dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ btud pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa me tog man da ra bas gang bar gyur nas/ 
18b3('bum): me tog man da ra ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// de ltar 'thor zhing
18b4('bum): mngon par 'thor ba dang / rab tu 'thor ba'i tshe/ tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma
18b5('bum): lags pa'i rnam par spyod pa dam pas bdag cag rnam pa ra spyod par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de nas bco ma ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gi bsam pa thug su
18b6('bum): su chud de/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra sa gyi chos nyid kyis kyang / de ste de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'di lta ste/ 
18b7('bum): 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
18b8('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang nas phyir 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'am gtsug tu
19a1('bum): nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lda nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom
19a2('bum): ldan 'das gang la de log su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
19a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
19a4('bum): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo dge slong brgya drug cu po 'di dag bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la/ bla na med pa yang dag
19a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
19a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19a7('bum): de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun mtshungs par 'gyur/ tshe'i tshad kyang 'di lta ste/ lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 
19a8('bum): mngon par byung nas/ rab tu 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dang de dag tu me tog kha dog
19b1('bum): rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab par 'gyuraro// dga' bo de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa'i dam pas rnam par spyod
19b2('bum): par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam spyod pas/ rnam par spyod par 'dod
19b3('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
19b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ltar bdag ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'pho sa nas 'dir skyes pa ste/ mi'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol
19b5('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'i zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya
19b6('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par lta ste/ dga'
19b7('bum): bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
19b8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston cing / rjesu 'dems pa'i gang zag byang chub
20a1('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa des/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
20a2('bum): pa zab mo 'di thos par 'gyur/ bzung ba dang bcangs pa dang blags pa dang / kun chub par byas par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
20a3('bum): rgyas de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par gyur to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par byas te/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des bdag gis ni nyan thos rnams la
20a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed nyan thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yino zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
20a5('bum): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / don dang chos dang yi ge dang 'thun par khong du
20a6('bum): chud par byed na/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ro des bdag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon tu gyur to zhes bya bar
20a7('bum): rtogs par rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa thos na/ phyir mi ldog cing ngan du mi brjod
20a8('bum): la/ thos nas kyang mos pa thob par 'gyur na/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
20b1('bum): yongs su bzung bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las dge ba
20b2('bum): rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga yang mi slu ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang / dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
20b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang
20b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
20b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la skye/ da pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
20b6('bum): spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la s+ho
20b7('bum): pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyidadi la spyod pa dang
20b8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang
21a1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / 
21a2('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang
21a3('bum): tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
21a4('bum): 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge/ 
21a5('bum): 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / 
21a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / 
21a7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa
21a8('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pas shin tu rtogs par bya'o// shin tu rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
21b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gta
21b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa
21b3('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas
21b4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa
21b5('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyi da stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
21b6('bum): la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
21b7('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / 
21b8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod
22a1('bum): pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang yatha
22a2('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
22a3('bum): la spyod pa dang / ting 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang
22a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa
22a5('bum): dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa dang / nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgya su mi 'gyuraro// dga' bo de bas na
22a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad de/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang ji snyed cig bshad pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par/ 
22a7('bum): ngas chos bstan pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chud srun te bor yang de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la skyon du ngas mi brtsi'o// dga' bo gal te
22a8('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud srun tam/ bor bar gyur na/ des ni dga' bo khyod la nges skyon tu bzung ngo // 
22b1('bum): dga' bo de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad kyis/ ci nas kyang gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / shin tu
22b2('bum): yid la bzung bar gyis shig/ legs par yongs su zin pa dang / legs par kun chub pa dang / legs par bcang bar gyis shig/ yi ge dang / tshig dang / 'bru shin tu rdzogs
22b3('bum): pa dang / nges pa'i tshig legs par shin tu zin par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
22b4('bum): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des ni/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das kyis byang chub bzung bar 'gyur ro// dga'
22b5('bum): bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa de sa na/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
22b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub 'thun par yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo mngon par gyur par nga la gang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 
22b7('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dad gyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa nges shes rab
22b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung bar bya bcang bar bya/ klag par bya ba dang / kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang po 'di bzung ste/ bcangs
23a1('bum): nas blags shing kur chub par bya ste/ me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ra bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal bar
23a2('bum): dang / ba dan gyis/ rim gror bya/ bkur bstir bya/ pu dud du bya/ mchod par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gre dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byas nas
23a3('bum): des ni nga yang mchod par 'gyur/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mchod par 'gyuraro// dga' bo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol
23a4('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa la rim gro dang / dga' ba dang mos pa skyed pa des ni/ 'das pa dang ma byod pa dang / da lta ra byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro
23a5('bum): dang dga' ba dang mos pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te khyod la nga sdug cing yid du 'ong la yongs su ma btang zhe na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi
23a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang / yongasu mi gtong bar gyis shig/ ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las tshig 'ga' yang khyod kyis chung ma zos par gyis shig
23a7('bum): dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di gtad pa brtsams te/ khyod la shin tu mang du bstan pa yang mdor na/ dga' bo khyod la nga ji ltar ston par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shes
23a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang khyod kyi ston pa yin gyis/ dga' bo de bas na ngas khyod la tshad med par gtad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongasu gtad de/ dga' bo de bas
23b1('bum): na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du brjod do/ sus sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa
23b2('bum): dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongasu ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub
23b3('bum): yongasu ma btang ba des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu btang bar mi bya ste/ 'di ni ngas gdam ngag go/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol
23b4('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / 'phel bar byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
23b5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di rnam grangs du mar rgya cher 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa
23b6('bum): dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ de ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ 
23b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bla na med pa yang dag
23b8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji skad cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
24a1('bum): de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin
24a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
24a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag na/ 
24a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho/ skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
24a5('bum): 'das/ de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na lho phyogs kyi
24a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
24a7('bum): dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i
24a8('bum): dus na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig/ 
24b1('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las
24b2('bum): byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
24b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / 
24b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med
24b5('bum): pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
24b6('bum): ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las 'byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ shar lho'i phyogs
24b7('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
24b8('bum): dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i
25a1('bum): dus na lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
25a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes
25a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na
25a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho// skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
25a5('bum): 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ 'og gi phyogs
25a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'a
25a7('bum): sbyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // da ltar byung
25a8('bum): ba'i dus na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed
25b1('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
25b2('bum): las byung ngo // dga' bo de bas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par 'dod pa'i
25b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
25b4('bum): pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma ste/ skyed par byed pa'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
25b5('bum): slob pa de dag thams cad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' ba de bas na/ khyod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag
25b6('bum): yang dang yang du yongs su gtad do// rjes su gtad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos
25b7('bum): kyi mdzod do// 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mdzod ni zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzod do// dga' bo phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de
25b8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / pha rol
26a1('bum): tu phyin pa drug gi mdzod 'di las ston to// dga' bo 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba
26a2('bum): de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos bstan to// dga' bo ma 'ongs
26a3('bum): pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslabs te/ bla na pang
26a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos kyang ston par 'gyur/ ro// dga' bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
26a5('bum): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ yongasu mya ngan las
26a6('bum): 'das par gyur to// yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o// yong su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te khyod kyis/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la nyan thos kyis brtsams
26a7('bum): te chos bstan pa'i chos bstan pa des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur kyang / 
26a8('bum): da dung nyan thos khyod kyis nga'i nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
26b1('bum): tshig 'ga' zhing brjod de/ de bstan kyang nyan thos khyod kyis nga bgyes par byas pa yin te/ nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ chos bstan
26b2('bum): pa snga ma des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga byi med par dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur na/ dgra bcom pa de dag
26b3('bum): gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
26b4('bum): 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom lnga na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo de bas gang zag na thos kyi theg pa pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems
26b5('bum): dpa' chen po la/ chung ngu ni nyi ma cig gcig shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dga'
26b6('bum): nyin cig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te nyi ma phyed dam/ dga' bo nyi ma phyed lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te snga dro gcig gam/ dga' bo snga dro gcig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te chu tshod gcig
26b7('bum): tsam/ dga' bo chu tshod gcig tsam lta zhog go/ dga' bo gal te de skad 'ga' yud dga' zhig/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
26b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan na/ dga' bo de'i bsod nams ni mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
27a1('bum): kyi bu mo de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang des zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zag byang chub
27a2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa rnams la/ chung ngu na nyi ma cig gam/ nyi ma phyed dam/ snga dro gcig gam/ chu tshod gcig tsam 'am/ skad 'ga' yud 'ga' thang 'ga' zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
27a3('bum): pa dang ldan pa'o// chos ston na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo thams cad kyi da
27a4('bum): ba'i rtse ba zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
27a5('bum): 'dod la/ gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub tu yang dag par skul zhing / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa yin/ yang dag par spro bar byed pa yin/ 
27a6('bum): yang dag par gzhog pa yin/ yang dag par 'god pa yin te/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
27a7('bum): bzhi la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / dbang po lnga la spyod pa dang / stobs lnga la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
27a8('bum): spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / gzugs
27b1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
27b2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / tingange 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de
27b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
27b4('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom
27b5('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid la spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par
27b6('bum): 'phel ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yong su nyam pa'i gnas med/ skabs med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ 
27b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am/ ci
27b8('bum): dang / lto 'phye chen po de ltar 'khod pa rnams kyi mdun du/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas thams cad kyis/ de bzhin
28a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug pa 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu 'khrug pa med pa/ ku
28a2('bum): kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes
28a3('bum): pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas
28a4('bum): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub
28a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba pa
28a6('bum): mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de/ phyir brtul bar gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
28a7('bum): mdzad pa/ de phyir brtul bar gyur nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
28a8('bum): pa yang ma mthong // gang zag nyan thos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
28b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i zhing yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas las sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun yang mig lam na mi snang bar
28b2('bum): gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ phyir brtul ba
28b3('bum): mdzad pas/ de'i phyir de dag gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis de
28b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
28b5('bum): pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chu ba sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang ma mthong / 
28b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de yang ma mthong / dge slong gi dge 'dun de yang ma mthong / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de yang ma mthong ste/ rmi lam du yang mi gda'o// 
28b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mig lam du snang ba ma yin te/ chos la chos snang bar mi 'gyur ro// chos kyis chos
28b8('bum): mi mthong / chos kyis chos mi shes so// dga' bo ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / nyan thos de
29a1('bum): ngag dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mig lam du snang bar ma gyur pa de bzhin du chos thams
29a2('bum): cad kyang mig lam du snang ba ma yin te/ chos la chos snang bar mi 'gyur/ chos kyis chos mi mthong / chos kyis chos mi shes so// dga' bo chos thams cad ni shes
29a3('bum): pa mthong ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ bya ba la mthu med pa sha stag ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo chos thams cad ni na mkha' ltar byed pa med pas/ byed pa med
29a4('bum): cing 'dzin pa med pa'o// dga' bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu ste/ bsam gyis mi khya ba pa'o// dga' bo chos thams cad ni sems dang
29a5('bum): bral zhing / rnam par bsgrub pas so sor gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de/ snying po med pa'i phyir tshor ba med do// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dang
29a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do// dga' bo de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
29a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yos
29a8('bum): su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de ltar slob pa ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// dam
29b1('bum): pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang ma
29b2('bum): pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba mgon med pa rnams la mgon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ sangs rgyas
29b3('bum): bsngags pa ste/ de la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
29b4('bum): gyi khams 'di phyag g.yas pas/ gyen tu bteg cing phyir gzhog kyang / sems can de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bdas
29b5('bum): go// zhes bya ba dang / gzhag go zhes bya bar mi shes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
29b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid la bslabs pas/ chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa bsgrungs pa
